</mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-24" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">5. Scan QR code</font></h3><h3><span style="color: rgb(48 , 50 , 51) ; font-weight: normal"><font style="font-size: 14px ; line-height: 150%">Proceed to scan the QR code using MoMo app or any QR code reader app on mobile device.</font></span><br></h3>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=6;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="1220" width="220" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-25" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-26" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-45"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-26" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">6. Confirm payment</font></h3><h3><span style="color: rgb(48 , 50 , 51) ; font-weight: normal"><font style="font-size: 14px ; line-height: 150%">Confirm the payment on MoMo app's 'secured payment screen'.</font></span><br></h3>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=6;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="1390" width="220" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-27" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-28" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-49"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-28" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">4. Get payment method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Depending on the payment method received, proceeds accordingly.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="360" width="220" height="112" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-29" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-30" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-30" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font style="font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4.3. Generate QR code</font></h3><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">The payment method <b>qrCodeUrl </b>is returned for merchant who operates based on system which does not support internet browser hence cannot use the web-based ready-built UI provided by MoMo.</font></p><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Merchant generates the QR code then displays it in merchant's custom UI (approved by MoMo).</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="536" y="880" width="224" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-31" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-32" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-52"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-32" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font style="line-height: 140% ; font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4.2. Redirect to MoMo web</font></h3><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">The payment method <b>payUrl&nbsp; &nbsp; </b>(default method) is returned for merchant who operates on website.</font></p><font style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Merchant redirects user to MoMo website via this payUrl.&nbsp;This website automatically detects the platform in which merchant's website is running on to proceed accordingly.</font><font color="#ad246f"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=2;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="560" width="220" height="300" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-33" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-34" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-39"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-34" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font style="line-height: 140% ; font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">2. Request payment method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Merchant system initiates an order containing order information associated with a unique orderId, then sends to MoMo for requesting the payment method most appropriate, along with the Merchant's credentials.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="99" width="220" height="242" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-35" value="<p style="line-height: 130%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">8. Display payment result</font></h3><p><font style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px">Receive payment result, then display the result to user's acknowledgement.</font></p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="1620" width="220" height="114" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-36" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-37" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-37" value="<h3><font style="line-height: 140% ; font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4.2.2. MoMo web on non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">If user is on desktop website (usually of PC, 2nd monitor of dual-screen POS device, some Kiosk devices), tablet or smartTV, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo's payment gateway website which displays a QR code in pre-built UI.</font></p><font color="#ad246f"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="880" width="220" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-38" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-39" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-28"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-39" value="<p style="line-height: 140%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">3. Return payment method</font></h3><p><font style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">After validating the merchant authentication, respond with the requested payment method.</font></p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=default;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="99" width="220" height="242" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-40" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-41" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-26"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-41" value="<p style="line-height: 130%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">4.2.1. </font><font style="font-size: 16px" color="#99004d">MoMo</font><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px"> web on mobile</font></h3><h3 style="font-size: 14px"><font style="font-size: 14px"><span style="color: rgb(48 , 50 , 51) ; font-weight: normal ; line-height: 150%">If user is on a mobile device, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo app. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed yet, payUrl will redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</span></font></h3><font color="#ad246f" style="font-size: 14px"><b><br></b></font><p></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=4;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="880" width="220" height="322" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-42" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-43" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-26"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-43" value="<p style="line-height: 100%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font style="font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4.1. Redirect to MoMo app</font></h3><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">The payment method <font style="font-weight: bold ; font-size: 14px">deeplink </font>or <font style="font-weight: bold ; font-size: 14px">deeplinkMiniApp&nbsp;</font>is returned for merchant who operates on mobile application.</font></p><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Merchant redirects user to MoMo app for them to confirm the payment. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed in user's mobile device, merchant should redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21"> <mxGeometry x="1059" y="360" width="221" height="320" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-44" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#727272;" edge="1" parent="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-21" source="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-45" target="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-35"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="68qwwxpgqxr8bHo_E7xc-45" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">7. Process payment</font></h3><h3><span style="color: rgb(48 , 50 , 51) ; font-weight: normal"><font style="font-size: 14px ; line-height: 150%">Process the payment, then return the payment transaction result to MoM, as well as redirect user back to Merchant's web/app if user's currently on mobile device.</font></span><br></h3>" Selection of the preferred&nbsp; payment method(s) and payment instruments' option(s)</font></h3><p><span style="color: rgb(48, 50, 51); font-size: 14px;">Depending on Merchant's Payment flow, End-User can select the specific authenticated payment method(s) and&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(48, 50, 51); font-size: 14px;">payment instruments' options.</span></p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-2"> <mxGeometry x="11" y="678" width="220" height="226" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-4" value="MERCHANT" style="swimlane;strokeColor=none;swimlaneFillColor=#FCFCFC;fillColor=#A50064;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Roboto;fillOpacity=100;verticalAlign=middle;spacing=2;rounded=1;shadow=0;glass=0;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;startSize=35;arcSize=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;container=1;metaEdit=0;portConstraint=none;overflow=visible;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="38" width="242" height="4089" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle x="269" y="40" width="80" height="35" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-20" value="<p style="line-height: 130%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">13. Generate QR code</font></h3><p style="font-size: 14px"><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">In case Merchant operates on the system that doesn't support internet&nbsp;browsers and cannot use the web-based ready-built UI provided by MoMo, <b>qrCodeUrl </b>will be returned to Merchant for generating and displaying of QR code via Merchant's custom UI approved by MoMo in advance.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-4"> <mxGeometry x="8" y="2100" width="223" height="270" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-17" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font style="line-height: 140% ; font-size: 16px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">8.2. Processing the payment result of "completed"</font></h3><p><span style="font-size: 14px;">Based on the final approval of the payment methods and payment instruments' options, MoMo's Payment Gateway will update the transaction status from <b>"in-process"</b> to <b>"completed"</b>&nbsp;to Merchant.</span></p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-5"> <mxGeometry x="12" y="3560" width="220" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HrYOMn0Ccxi3FdkTJz0L-13" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fillColor=none;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#727272;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-5"> <mxGeometry x="103" y="3473" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-30" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px;"><font color="#a50064">11. font-weight: normal ; line-height: 150%">After clicking the payment link by End-User, MoMo's Payment Gateway will display a full selection list of payment method(s) and instruments' options.</span></font></h3><div><font style="font-size: 14px"><span style="color: rgb(48 , 50 , 51) ; font-weight: normal ; line-height: 150%">After completion of selection, End-User will be redirected to MoMo app for proceeding payment.</span></font></div><font color="#ad246f" style="font-size: 14px"><b><br></b></font><p></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=4;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-5"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="2707.25" width="220" height="321.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-22" value="<h3><font style="line-height: 140% ; MoMo web on a non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">If End-User is on a desktop website (such as PC, 2nd monitor of a dual-screen POS device, devices at Kiosk), a tablet or a smartTV, Merchant will use&nbsp;<b>payUrl </b>to&nbsp;redirect End-User to MoMo's Payment Gateway (Step 9.2.1) and display the QR code on web-based ready-built UI.</font></p><font color="#ad246f"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="9NGn2QZAK0sm0UqNUdg1-5"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="2031" width="220" height="339" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-_mgIFrWWL6wvJLd-L7y-4" value="<p style="line-height: 140%"></p><h3 style="font-size: 16px;"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">7. Respond the final result</font></h3><p style="border-color: var(--border-color); font-size: 14px;">After finishing the disbursement process, respond the final result to Merchant to complete the transaction.&nbsp;</p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=default;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-1"> <mxGeometry x="23.75" y="1740" width="265" height="118.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-15" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-1" source="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-16" target="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-16" value="" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-1"> <mxGeometry x="136.25000000000006" y="1440" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17" value="MERCHANT" style="swimlane;strokeColor=none;swimlaneFillColor=#FCFCFC;fillColor=#A50064;fontSize=16;fontFamily=Roboto;fillOpacity=100;verticalAlign=middle;spacing=2;rounded=1;shadow=0;glass=0;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;startSize=35;arcSize=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;container=1;metaEdit=0;portConstraint=none;overflow=visible;" vertex="1" parent="VCvaWqrKckj8mIV7AiY--1"> <mxGeometry x="6540" y="540" width="318" height="2080" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle x="269" y="40" width="80" height="35" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-18" value="<h3 style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="line-height: 140%; font-size: 14px;" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri"><span style="font-size: 16px; color: rgb(165, 0, 100);">2. Create a Disbursement Remittance request.</span></font></h3><h3 style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="line-height: 140%; font-size: 14px;" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri"><span style="font-weight: normal;">Create a </span>Remittance <span style="font-weight: normal;">with disbursement request including recipient information&nbsp;</span>associated with&nbsp;Disburse 2 steps<span style="background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; font-weight: normal;">option</span><span style="background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;related to&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); font-weight: normal;">the field data&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial;">"autoCapture as FALSE</span><span style="background-color: initial; font-weight: normal;">"</span><span style="background-color: initial; border-color: var(--border-color); font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;(according to Merchant needs).&nbsp;</span><br></font></h3>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="52.5" width="260" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-19" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">5. Receive the requested result</font></h3><h3 style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Receive the result of the Disbursement&nbsp;</font><b style="background-color: initial; color: rgb(48, 50, 51);">Remittance creation process once it's done.&nbsp;</b></h3><div style="font-size: 14px;"><b style="color: rgb(48, 50, 51); background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Merchant shall make a decision for the next Disbursement process.</font></b></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="530" width="260" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-20" value="" style="rhombus;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="139" y="730" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-21" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17" source="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-19" target="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-22" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">6.1. Cancel to Disburse&nbsp;</font></h3><h3 style="font-size: 14px;"><span style="font-weight: normal;">Merchant </span>initiates to cancel the disbursement&nbsp;request (as Remittance Order)<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal;">&nbsp;</span>that has been done before <br>(at Step 4)</h3>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="810" width="260" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17" source="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-20" target="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-22"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-24" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">6.2. Confirm to Disburse&nbsp;</font></h3><h3 style=""><span style="font-weight: normal;">Merchant </span>starts to confirm the disbursement&nbsp;request (as Remittance Order) that has been done before <br>(at Step 4)</h3>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="970" width="260" height="136" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-25" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">8. Receive the disbursement status&nbsp;</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" style="line-height: 150% ; font-size: 14px" color="#303233">Merchant checks the status via IPN when the transaction is waiting to be claimed by the recipient <b>(Apply for the customer getting Remittance service as the 1st time) </b>OR</font><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: roboto; background-color: initial;">&nbsp;<font style="font-size: 14px;">calls API Check&nbsp; Transaction Status to check the result.</font></span></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;arcSize=7;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="1350" width="260" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-26" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-17" source="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-20" target="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="4901" y="1590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="4791" y="1901" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="8" y="750" /> <mxPoint x="8" y="1038" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-27" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">11. Confirm Disburse</font></h3><p style=""><font style="font-size: 14px;">Choose Disburse/Payout service via MoMo e-Wallet on Merchant's platform and confirm to proceed with the transaction.&nbsp;</font><span style="font-size: 13px;">&nbsp;</span><br></p>" style="text;html=1;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;arcSize=3;align=left;" vertex="1" parent="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-28"> <mxGeometry x="29" y="55" width="260" height="205" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7gj0_0r4d4XUuV_9aY6A-30" value="<h3 style="font-size: 16px"><font color="#a50064" style="font-size: 16px">9. value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">1. Checkout</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed to checkout and select a payment method provided by MoMo.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="292" y="110" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-27" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34" source="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-28" target="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-30"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-28" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">2. Initiate order</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant system initiates an order containing order information associated with a unique orderId (can be generated by either merchant or Adyen).&nbsp;</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="552" y="110" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34" source="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-30" target="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-32"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-30" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">3. Request payment method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Send the orderId to MoMo for requesting the payment method most appropriate, along with the merchant's credentials.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="812" y="110" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-31" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34" source="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-32" target="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-34"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-32" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4. Return payment method</font></h3><p><font>After validating the merchant authentication, respond with the requested payment method.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="1072" y="110" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-33" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34" source="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-34" target="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-35"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-34" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5. Get payment method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Depending on the payment method received, Adyen proceeds accordingly:</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="812" y="260" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-35" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fillColor=none;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="7QbMa5FKswk2rcz_cEpP-34"> <mxGeometry x="887" y="385" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="d-n92ff5caXEtoNc9-Uh-36" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.2. Ask to bind</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed bind MoMo as a payment account in Merchant's web/app settings.</font></p><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed to checkout and select to pay &amp; bind with MoMo's provided payment methods.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="296" y="102" width="190" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-2" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-3" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-3" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">2. Initiate order</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant system initiates an order containing order information associated with a unique orderId (can be generated by either merchant or Adyen).&nbsp;</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="556" y="102" width="190" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-4" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-5" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-5" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">3. Request binding method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Send the orderId to MoMo for requesting the binding method most appropriate, along with the Merchant's credentials, and customer's partnerClientId.</font></p><p><font>If the orderId is for pay &amp; bind, the amount must be more than 1000 VND.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="816" y="102" width="210" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-7" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-7" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">4. Return binding method</font></h3><p><font>After validating the merchant authentication, respond with the requested binding method.</font></p><p><font>If the orderId is for pay &amp; bind, the binding method also includes payment method.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1076" y="102" width="190" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-8" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="911" y="401.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="911.1428571428573" y="431.3928571428569" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-9" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5. Get binding method</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Depending on the binding method received, proceed accordingly:</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="816" y="302" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-10" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-17"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="911.1428571428573" y="471.1071428571429" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-12" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.3. Generate QR code</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font><b><font color="#a50064">qrCodeUrl</font> </b></font>is returned for merchant who operates based on system which does not support internet browser hence cannot use the web-based ready-built UI provided by MoMo.</font></p><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant generates the QR code then displays it in merchant's custom UI (approved by MoMo).</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="554" y="349" width="190" height="203.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-13" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="891" y="451.2499999999998" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="746" y="576.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-14" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.1. Redirect to MoMo app</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font style="font-weight: bold" color="#a50064">deeplink </font>or <font style="font-weight: bold" color="#a50064">deeplinkMiniApp&nbsp;</font>is returned for merchant who operates on mobile application.</font></p><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant redirects user to MoMo app for them to confirm the binding (and payment). In case MoMo app hasn't been installed in user's mobile device, merchant should redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1336" y="338" width="190" height="225.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="931" y="451.2499999999998" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1098.5" y="481.2500000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-16" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-17" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1146" y="691.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-17" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.2. Redirect to MoMo web</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font><b><font color="#a50064">payUrl&nbsp;</font> &nbsp; </b></font>(default method) is returned for merchant who operates on website.</font></p><span>Merchant redirects user to MoMo website via this payUrl.&nbsp;</span><span>This website </span><span>automatically detects the platform in which merchant's website is running on to proceed accordingly.</span><font><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="816" y="501.25" width="190" height="220.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-19" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-22"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-19" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fillColor=none;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1151" y="591.25" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-20" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.2.1. MoMo web on mobile</font></h3><p><font>If user is on a mobile device, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo app. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed yet, payUrl will redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p><font><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1336" y="661.25" width="190" height="140.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-21" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-19" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1196" y="691.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1286" y="671.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-22" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">5.2.2. MoMo web on non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font>If user is on desktop website (usually of PC, 2nd monitor of dual-screen POS device, some Kiosk devices), tablet or smartTV, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo's payment gateway website which displays a QR code in pre-built UI.</font></p><font><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1076" y="661.25" width="190" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-23" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-24" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-29"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-24" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">6. Scan QR code</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed to scan the QR code using MoMo app or any QR code reader app on mobile device.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="296" y="852" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-25" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-22" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1151" y="931.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="536" y="879" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-26" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-12" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-24"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="531" y="641.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="536" y="852" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-27" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">8. Process authen token</font></h3><p><font>Process the binding (and payment), then return the transaction(s) result, as well as redirect user back to Merchant's web/app if user's currently on mobile device.</font></p><p><font>A cbToken is returned alongside a successful binding transaction result's response (callback).</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=#E5E5E5;fillColor=default;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontColor=#303233;" vertex="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8"> <mxGeometry x="1076" y="1052" width="190" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-28" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=Roboto;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3DRoboto;fontSize=15;fontColor=#303233;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="TQkWLiDEshJbSk0wVfCl-8" source="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-29" target="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-27"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="391" y="1081.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1196" y="1071.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jXEg5Rd7Jz9OA6zIW4ib-29" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri" color="#a50064">7. Confirm binding</font></h3><p><font data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Confirm the binding (and payment) on MoMo app's 'secured payment screen'.</font></p>" Get payment method</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Depending on the payment method received,&nbsp; proceeds accordingly:</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="539" y="270" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-19" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-25"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-19" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fillColor=#647687;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="614" y="390" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-20" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.3. Generate QR code</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The payment method <font color="#ad246f"><b>qrCodeUrl </b></font>is returned for merchant who operates based on system which does not support internet browser hence cannot use the web-based ready-built UI provided by MoMo.</font></p><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant generates the QR code then displays it in merchant's custom UI (approved by MoMo).</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="685" width="190" height="196" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-21" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-19" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="634" y="509.9999999999999" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="500" y="773" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="520" y="410" /> <mxPoint x="520" y="783" /> <mxPoint x="540" y="783" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-22" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.1. Redirect to MoMo app</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The payment method <font color="#ad246f" style="font-weight: bold">deeplink </font>or <font color="#ad246f" style="font-weight: bold">deeplinkMiniApp&nbsp;</font>is returned for merchant who operates on mobile application.</font></p><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant redirects user to MoMo app for them to confirm the payment. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed in user's mobile device, merchant should redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="300" width="190" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-23" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-19" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-22"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="966.5" y="490.0000000000001" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="821.5" y="490.0000000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-24" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-25" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-27"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="869" y="700" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-25" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2. Redirect to MoMo web</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The payment method <font color="#ad246f"><b>payUrl&nbsp; &nbsp; </b></font>(default method) is returned for merchant who operates on website.</font></p><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">Merchant redirects user to MoMo website via this payUrl.&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">This website </span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">automatically detects the platform in which merchant's website is running on to proceed accordingly.</span><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="539" y="455" width="190" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-26" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-27" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-30"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-27" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fillColor=#647687;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="874" y="540" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-28" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2.1. MoMo web on mobile</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on a mobile device, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo app. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed yet, payUrl will redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="1050" y="610" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-27" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-28"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="919" y="700" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1009" y="680" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-30" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2.2. MoMo web on non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on desktop website (usually of PC, 2nd monitor of dual-screen POS device, some Kiosk devices), tablet or smartTV, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo's payment gateway website which displays a QR code in pre-built UI.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="799" y="610" width="190" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-31" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-32" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-37"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-32" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">5. Scan QR code</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed to scan the QR code using MoMo app or any QR code reader app on mobile device.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="860" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-33" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-30" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-32"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="874" y="940" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1114" y="990" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-34" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-7" source="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-20" target="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-32"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="254" y="650" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="389" y="950" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="buldaosl1jZ0lV-Axnl0-35" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">7. </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-9" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">1. Ask to bind</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed bind MoMo as a payment account in Merchant's web/app settings.</font></p><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Proceed to checkout and select to pay &amp; bind with MoMo's provided payment methods.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="90" width="190" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-13" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-15"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-13" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">2. Request binding method</font></h3><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">Merchant system initiates an order containing order information associated with a unique orderId, the send it</span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">&nbsp;to MoMo for requesting the binding method most appropriate, along with the Merchant's credentials, and customer's partnerClientId.</span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><br></span><p><font face="calibri">If the orderId is for pay &amp; bind, the amount must be more than 1000 VND.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="90" width="210" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-14" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-15" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-17"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-15" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">3. Return binding method</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">After validating the merchant authentication, respond with the requested binding method.</font></p><p><font face="calibri">If the orderId is for pay &amp; bind, the binding method also includes payment method.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="90" width="190" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-16" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-17" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-19"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="635" y="389.25" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-17" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4. Get binding method</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Depending on the binding method received, proceed accordingly:</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="330" width="190" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-18" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-19" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-25"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-19" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fillColor=#647687;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="615" y="450" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-20" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.3. Generate QR code</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font color="#ad246f"><b>qrCodeUrl </b></font>is returned for merchant who operates based on system which does not support internet browser hence cannot use the web-based ready-built UI provided by MoMo.</font></p><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant generates the QR code then displays it in merchant's custom UI (approved by MoMo).</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="743" width="190" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-21" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-19" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-20"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="635" y="489.2499999999999" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="470" y="564.25" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="520" y="470" /> <mxPoint x="520" y="838" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-22" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.1. Redirect to MoMo app</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font color="#ad246f" style="font-weight: bold">deeplink </font>or <font color="#ad246f" style="font-weight: bold">deeplinkMiniApp&nbsp;</font>is returned for merchant who operates on mobile application.</font></p><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant redirects user to MoMo app for them to confirm the binding (and payment). In case MoMo app hasn't been installed in user's mobile device, merchant should redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="357.75" width="190" height="226.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-23" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-19" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-22"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="967.5" y="469.2500000000001" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="822.5" y="469.2500000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-24" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-25" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-27"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="870" y="679.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-25" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2. Redirect to MoMo web</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">The binding method <font color="#ad246f"><b>payUrl&nbsp; &nbsp; </b></font>(default method) is returned for merchant who operates on website.</font></p><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">Merchant redirects user to MoMo website via this payUrl.&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">This website </span><span style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;">automatically detects the platform in which merchant's website is running on to proceed accordingly.</span><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="515" width="190" height="210" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-26" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-27" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-30"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-27" value="" style="rhombus;rounded=0;shadow=0;glass=0;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fillColor=#647687;verticalAlign=top;strokeColor=#314354;fontColor=#ffffff;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="875" y="600" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-28" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2.1. MoMo web on mobile</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on a mobile device, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo app. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed yet, payUrl will redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="670" width="190" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-27" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-28"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="920" y="679.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1010" y="659.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-30" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4.2.2. MoMo web on non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on desktop website (usually of PC, 2nd monitor of dual-screen POS device, some Kiosk devices), tablet or smartTV, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo's payment gateway website which displays a QR code in pre-built UI.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="670" width="190" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-31" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" edge="1" parent="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-7" source="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-32" target="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-37"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="haJDP6WYwqEhLcwjADql-32" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">5.
