Initiate order</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Merchant system initiates an order containing order information associated with a unique orderId (can be generated by either merchant or MoM).&nbsp;</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-7" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="90" width="190" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-7" source="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-13" target="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-13" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">3. Request binding method</font></h3><p><font face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">Send the orderId to MoMo for requesting the binding method most appropriate, along with the Merchant's credentials, and customer's partnerClientId.</font></p><p><font face="calibri">If the orderId is for pay &amp; bind, the amount must be more than 1000 VND.</font></p>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-7" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="540" y="90" width="210" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-14" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-7" source="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-15" target="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-17" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="GHojMX8P1tUlKtInw6HX-15" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">4. MoMo web on mobile</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on a mobile device, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo app. In case MoMo app hasn't been installed yet, payUrl will redirect user to app store for MoMo app installation.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-7" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="649.25" width="190" height="140.75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-29" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-7" source="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-27" target="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-28" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="920" y="679.25" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="1010" y="659.25" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-30" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">5.2.2. MoMo web on non-mobile device(s)</font></h3><p><font face="calibri">If user is on desktop website or smartTV which supports internet browser, the payUrl will redirect user to MoMo's payment gateway website which displays a QR code in pre-built UI.</font></p><font color="#ad246f" style="font-family: &#34;calibri&#34;"><b><br></b></font>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;spacing=10;spacingTop=-20;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" parent="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-7" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="800" y="649.25" width="190" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-31" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=1;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;fontFamily=calibri;fontSource=https%3A%2F%2Ffonts.googleapis.com%2Fcss%3Ffamily%3Dcalibri;fontSize=15;fontColor=#666666;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-7" source="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-32" target="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-37" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-f3A6B269BkkUEkyNVeM-32" value="<h3><font style="font-size: 14px" face="calibri" data-font-src="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=calibri">6.
